resources.string: I\'m a Native Android Developer from Nigeria. I create Android Apps, mostly using the Kotlin programming language. Passionate about learning, building and teaching tech. When I\'m not coding, I\'m either reading a novel, listening to music or watching a movie.

I can add a lot of value to your company as an android developer. I have over 5 years of experience in the field, and I\'m proficient in Java and Kotlin. I\'m also familiar with the Android SDK and Android Studio. I\'m confident that I can help your company create high-quality android apps that meet the needs of your customers.
